translations.about_description: This is an man looking to horizon
translations.subject: Subject
translations.sentMessage: Your message has been sent. Thank you!
translations.title: Early Adopter View
translations.title_what_is: What is an Early Adopter View?
translations.desc_what_is: It is a preliminary version of a product or feature designed for users who want to try new functionalities before their official release. These users are key to providing feedback and helping us improve.
translations.features_access: Limited access to a select group of users.
translations.features_feedback: Active feedback to improve the product.
translations.desc_help: As an Early Adopter, you will have the opportunity to test our developing features and provide your valuable feedback. Your participation is essential to help us build a better product.
translations.button_join: I want to be an Early Adopter!
